function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low adherence to self-protection measures","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promote public awareness and provide resources for self-protection measures","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, distribution of masks and sanitizers","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate effect on reducing peak value of infections","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system and potential increase in mortality rate","Mitigation":"Invest in healthcare capacity and resources, prioritize vaccination programs","Technologies":"Medical facilities, vaccine distribution systems","People":"Healthcare workers, at-risk populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Self-protection measures do not fundamentally cut off the path of spread of the virus","Impact":"Continuous risk of transmission and epidemic outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive public health strategies, enforce testing and contact tracing","Technologies":"Testing technology, contact tracing apps, public health surveillance systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
